rows.name: help_button
rows.value:
Instead of using routine methods to practice math facts and skills, use puzzles to practice those same skills in more engaging ways that invite discussion and exploration.

These puzzles are separated into increasing levels of difficulty and math content.

Select from two types of puzzles. 
* **Eye Openers** might be done during one class session.
* **Puzzlers** take time, quite possibly several days..
